name: cometd to kafka
description: a simple cometd to kafka or rabbitmq translation.IP

USERNAME.Description: username of the SF Connected App
USERNAME.value: username of the SF Connected App

PASSWORD.Description: password of the SF connected App
PASSWORD.value: password of the SF connected App

TOPICS.Description: list of Topics on Salesforce to listen to

KAFKA_URL.Description: KAFKA Url to connect to - will be filled if you deploy Heroku Kafka Addon
KAFKA_URL.value: KAFKA Url to connect to - will be filled if you deploy Heroku Kafka Addon

KAFKA_CLIENT_CERT.Description: Kafka Client certificate - will be filled if you deploy Heroku Kafka Addon
KAFKA_CLIENT_CERT.value: Kafka Client certificate - will be filled if you deploy Heroku Kafka Addon

KAFKA_CLIENT_CERT_KEY.Description: Kafla Client Key - will be filled if you deploy Heroku Kafka Addon
KAFKA_CLIENT_CERT_KEY.value: Kafla Client Key - will be filled if you deploy Heroku Kafka Addon

KAFKA_TRUSTED_CERT.Description: Kafka CA - will be filled if you deploy Heroku Kafka Addon
KAFKA_TRUSTED_CERT.value: Kafka CA - will be filled if you deploy Heroku Kafka Addon

KAFKA_PREFIX.Description: Kafka topic prefix - will be filled if you deploy Heroku Kafka Addon
KAFKA_PREFIX.value: Kafka topic prefix - will be filled if you deploy Heroku Kafka Addon

CLOUDAMQP_URL.Description: CLOUDAMQP_URL to be filled by cloudamqp addon later
CLOUDAMQP_URL.value: CLOUDAMQP_URL to be filled by cloudamqp addon later

QUEUING_SYSTEM.Description: Which system to use for the queuing system: values are KAFKA/CLOUDAMQP. Will default to CLOUDAMQP

SANDBOX.Description: Connects to a sandbox or a scratch org (True/False)
